LanguageData.BreadMo_NutrientDrain.label: 营养液进料口
LanguageData.BreadMo_NutrientDrain.description: 将瓶装营养液倒进管网的水龙头。
LanguageData.BreadMo_NutrientPipe.label: 营养液管道
LanguageData.BreadMo_NutrientPipe.description: 输送水培营养液的管道.
LanguageData.BreadMo_NutrientPipeUnderground.label: 地下营养液管道
LanguageData.BreadMo_NutrientPipeUnderground.descript: 输送水培营养液的地下管道.
LanguageData.BreadMo_NutrientTankSmall.label: 营养液储罐
LanguageData.BreadMo_NutrientTankSmall.description: 用于缓冲的加压营养液罐.
LanguageData.BreadMo_NutrientTap.label: 营养液龙头
LanguageData.BreadMo_NutrientTap.description: 将营养液注入瓶子的水龙头。
